H0.text: In June 1978, who became the first cricketer to score a century and take eight wickets in one inning in a Test Match. Richard Hadlee

H1.text: In June 1978, who became the first cricketer to score a century and take eight wickets in one inning in a Test Match. Imran Khan

H2.text: In June 1978, who became the first cricketer to score a century and take eight wickets in one inning in a Test Match. Kapil Dev

H3.text: In June 1978, who became the first cricketer to score a century and take eight wickets in one inning in a Test Match. Ian Botham
